Franz Liszt

Preludio funebre, S. 205b

1885 · LW – · R. 83

[IMSLP]

This piece also exists in a different version with a slightly longer ending, the Trauervorspiel from the Trauervorspiel und Trauermarsch (S. 206; LW A334; R. 84).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2
